body:
Hey guys, haven't done one for a bit and since I have become Junior Mod I decided that this would probably the best time to do one!

Go on, ask me anything :P
Please keep it appropriate tho!
body_tagged:

Go on, ask me anything :P
Please keep it appropriate tho!

replies.body: How happy are you about being promoted?
replies.body_tagged: How happy are you about being promoted?

replies.body:
@jahaj12 My real life name is Vlad, I was really uncreative and was dreaming that I would be great (was being bullied during that time) and vladthegreat wasn't available so I took 100
@Jk nice try :P too bad ya got ninja'd
@ivi was pretty hyped :D tried to stay calm tho because my parents were home .-.
@mooch I don't know xD, I decided to do this because I hadn't done one for a long time, was never planned xD
@Juano pretty sweet :)
@Tino I have no clue .-. lmfao
@TNT YES I will always love youuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu
@PorkEY Really happy :D I am happy we both got it at right after another, mod buddies for life :)

replies.body: Are you going to give up the MCSG moderator position, or are you moderating both servers?
replies.body_tagged: Are you going to give up the MCSG moderator position, or are you moderating both servers?

replies.body:
@Evocal foootiieee ftw
And yes, I would watch a movie with you :)
@x_Heat, I will try my best to moderate both servers, I originally went to MCSG to get experience for avicus, but I signed a contract with MCSG so I will stay, and I worked too hard and love it too much to leave resign off Avicus.

replies.body: Its awesome! I think I already have a headache tho .-. probably because I've been in front of my computer screen for the past 7 hours and had half a slice pizza in the past 7 hours (parents forgot to feed me therefore my dad gave me half the last slice since he had to eat) xD

replies.body: What's 9 + 10?
replies.body_tagged: What's 9 + 10?

replies.body:
@MLGtino
9+10 = 21

9 = 3X3                    3X5 = 15
10 = 5X2                  3X2 = 6

                15+6 = 21

Therefore 9+10 is confirmed that it is 21
replies.body_tagged:
@MLGtino
9+10 = 21

9 = 3X3                    3X5 = 15
10 = 5X2                  3X2 = 6

                15+6 = 21

Therefore 9+10 is confirmed that it is 21
